name: The Disunion Project
short_description: The Disunion Engine is a development platform based on Id Software's Quake 2 engine, oriented towards structure and ease of development as opposed to graphical proofs of concept. Contains tech such as the Disunion Object Layer and LibAX Skeletal Library
